00010 using namespace std;
00011 
00012 #include <iostream>
00013 #include <stdio.h>
00014 #include <unistd.h>
00015 
00016 #include "DebugPrint.h"
00017 
00024 void DebugPrint(char *fmtStr, ...)
00025 {
00026 #ifndef RELEASE
00027     va_list args;
00028     char    str[MAX_MSG_SIZE];
00029 
00030     // Format the args into a string
00031     va_start(args, fmtStr);
00032     vsnprintf(str, MAX_MSG_SIZE, fmtStr, args);
00033     va_end(args);
00034 
00035     // Send to Linux system log
00036     syslog(LOG_INFO, str);
00037 
00038 
00039 #ifdef DEBUG
00040 #ifdef VERBOSE
00041     cout<<str<<endl;  // also print to the screen
00042 #endif
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 }
